name: TV on the Radio
description:
'''TV on the Radio''' ('''TVOTR''') is an American [[rock music|rock]] band from [[Brooklyn, New York]], formed in 2001. The band consists of [[Tunde Adebimpe]] (vocals, loops), [[Dave Sitek]] (guitars, keyboards, loops), [[Kyp Malone]] (vocals, guitars, bass, loops), and Jaleel Bunton (drums, bass, vocals, loops, guitars). [[Gerard Smith (musician)|Gerard Smith]] (bass, keyboards, loops) was a member of the band from 2005 until his death in 2011.

TVOTR has released five studio albums: ''[[Desperate Youth, Blood Thirsty Babes]]'' (2004), ''[[Return to Cookie Mountain]]'' (2006), ''[[Dear Science]]'' (2008), ''[[Nine Types of Light]]'' (2011), and ''[[Seeds (TV on the Radio album)|Seeds]]'' (2014), alongside several EPs.
